message: Take it or leave it, Bob!
Let's split it 50/50, a fair deal!
You're getting closer, Bob! Meet me in the middle!
I'll give you a better deal, but not that bad! Try to meet me in the middle this time!
You're getting closer, Bob! Don't be shy!
I'm not giving in yet, Alice! I'll give you a better deal, but not that much!
I'm not getting any younger, Bob! Let's wrap this up!
I'm not giving in, Alice! I'll give you a better deal, but you're going to have to meet me halfway!
I'm not going to get any more generous, Bob! This is my final offer!
I'm not going to back down, Alice! I'll give you a better deal, but you're going to have to meet me at the table!
This is my last chance, Bob! Take it or leave it!
I'm not going to give in, Alice! I'll take it all or nothing!
